name: FROGE
description:
Keyboard Controls

  • MOVE: arrows
  • JUMP: spacebar / up-arrow
  • RETRY: enter

Touch Controls

  • MOVE: touch either side of the screen
  • JUMP: touch both sides of the screen, or the center of the screen
  • RETRY: touch anywhere

Levels are procedurally generated, but it is definitely possible to get to at least screen 20. Don't give up!
